```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#import data
drone_data <- read.csv(here("intermediate_files", "raw_elevation_values_drone.csv")) 

drone_data <- drone_data %>% 
  mutate(height_above_terrain = Altitude - t_hae_m_1)

# Subtract real height, which differed by test
drone_data$real_hat <- c(rep(119.238, 15), rep(120.396, 34))

drone_data <- drone_data %>% 
  mutate(error = height_above_terrain-real_hat)

drone_mean <- mean(drone_data$error)
drone_sd <-sd(drone_data$error)

write.csv(drone_data, here("drone_data", "drone_data_corrected.csv"))

```
